issue.title: roslaunch not working properly when using enviroment variables

content.raw:
The [gzclient script](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/indigo-devel/gazebo_ros/scripts/gzclient#L17) in `gazebo_ros` sources the gazebo setup.sh script, which [overwrites the GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH variable](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/annotate/b7634164f988c254f547aa7ce3c3b3774a2e80fc/cmake/setup.sh.in?at=default#cl-5). This was implemented in [gazebo pull request 1170](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/1170/added-ground-plane-and-sun-models-and/diff) for gazebo4 and higher.

I'll make a pull request to extend the `GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH` rather than over-writing it completely.
content.html:
The gzclient script in gazebo_ros sources the gazebo setup.sh script, which overwrites the GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH variable. This was implemented in gazebo pull request 1170 for gazebo4 and higher.

I'll make a pull request to extend the GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH rather than over-writing it completely.
